attributes.action: Add "Heads, Shoulders, Knees and Toes" to the education curriculum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I grew up singing this song and it brought a lot of joy to me, and many others. It may prove successful in preventing future Anti-Social Behavious in hoodlums. It also has hand actions!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
